code: import http from'../http-common';import{UploadHttp}from'../http-common';var uploadPhoto=function uploadPhoto(data){return UploadHttp.post("/orders/uploadPhoto",data);};var createPhoto=function createPhoto(data){return UploadHttp.post("/orders/createPhoto",data);};var getPhotos=function getPhotos(data){return http.get("/orders/photos",data);};var deletePhoto=function deletePhoto(id){return http.delete("/orders/photos/".concat(id));};var PhotoService={uploadPhoto:uploadPhoto,createPhoto:createPhoto,getPhotos:getPhotos,deletePhoto:deletePhoto};export default PhotoService;
